isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - CAB DOOR WINDOW GLASS AND FRONT RUN CHANNEL

svcproc.title: CAB DOOR WINDOW GLASS AND FRONT RUN CHANNEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Cab Door Window Glass and Front Run Channel

step1.para:
Remove driver side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 73 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two pan head mach. screws (Item 1) securing window glass front run channel bracket (Item 2) to bottom of cab door (Item 3).

Remove wood block (Item 4) used to hold cab door window glass (Item 5) up. Lower window glass to bottom of cab door. Pull the bottom of window glass front run channel and mounting bracket (Items 6 and 2) out and push forward slightly. Slide window glass out of front window glass run channel (Item 6), then slide window glass up and out of rear window glass run channel (Item 7) to remove window glass from cab door. Lay cab door window glass on padded work surface and save for reinstallation, unless being replaced.

svcsubproc.para: If it is necessary to remove WINDOW GLASS FRONT RUN CHANNEL and FRONT RUN CHANNEL FILLER CORNER (Items 6 and 8) from cab door, follow Steps 6 and 7 below.

step1.para: Use a small pick and pull material out of channel of window glass front run channel (Item 6) at front run channel filler corner (Item 8); this will expose two pan head self-tapping mach. screws (Item 9) in front run channel filler corner.

Remove two pan head self-tapping mach. screws (Item 9) from front run channel filler corner (Item 8) and remove window glass front run channel and front run channel filler corner (Items 6 and 8) from cab door frame. Save for reinstallation, unless being replaced.

If replacing window glass front run channel (Item 6), remove one pan head mach. screw (Item 10) and remove window glass front run channel bracket (Item 2). Save for installation on new window glass front run channel.

figure.caption: Figure 73. Driver Side Cab Door Window Glass and Front Run Channel

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. WINDOW GLASS FRONT RUN CHANNEL BRACKET
9. PAN HEAD SELF-TAPPING MACH. SCREW, NO. 10-16 X 1

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Window Glass and Front Run Channel

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 74 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two pan head mach. screws (Item 1) securing window glass front run channel bracket (Item 2) to bottom of cab door (Item 3).

Remove wood block (Item 4) used to hold cab door window glass (Item 5) up. Lower window glass to bottom of cab door. Pull the bottom of window glass front run channel and mounting bracket (Items 6 and 2) out and push forward slightly. Slide window glass out of front window glass run channel (Item 6), then slide window glass up and out of rear window glass run channel (Item 7) to remove window glass from cab door. Lay cab door window glass on padded work surface and save for reinstallation, unless being replaced.

svcsubproc.para: If it is necessary to remove WINDOW GLASS FRONT RUN CHANNEL and FRONT RUN CHANNEL FILLER CORNER (Items 6 and 8) from cab door, follow Steps 6 and 7 below.

step1.para: Use a small pick and pull material out of channel of window glass front run channel (Item 6) at front run channel filler corner (Item 8); this will expose two pan head self-tapping mach. screws (Item 9) in front run channel filler corner.

Remove two pan head self-tapping mach. screws (Item 9) from front run channel filler corner (Item 8) and remove window glass front run channel and front run channel filler corner (Items 6 and 8) from cab door frame. Save for reinstallation, unless being replaced.

If replacing window glass front run channel (Item 6), remove one pan head mach. screw (Item 10) and remove window glass front run channel bracket (Item 2). Save for installation on new window glass front run channel.

figure.caption: Figure 74. Passenger Side Cab Door Window Glass and Front Run Channel

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. WINDOW GLASS FRONT RUN CHANNEL BRACKET
9. PAN HEAD SELF-TAPPING MACH. SCREW, NO. 10-16 X 1
